Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron

Class BiasNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron.Neuron
      • Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron.BiasNeuron

  • public class BiasNeuron
extends Neuron
    Stripped down version of the Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron class, represents a neuron with static input
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(Jama.Matrix input)
        The bias neuron has a static input of one. This method ignores all other passed input and sets the bias neurons input statically.
        Overrides:
        process in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        input - the neurons input Matrix (no effect)
        See Also:
        activate(double)

      • adjustSynapseWeights

        public void adjustSynapseWeights(Jama.Matrix weightDelta)
        Description copied from class: Neuron
        Adjusts neurons weight matrix by a given delta. Used in the back-propagation algorithm
        Overrides:
        adjustSynapseWeights in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        weightDelta - The delta Matrix to be added to the neurons weights.
